MapConditionDef.label: Zombie Virus Active
MapConditionDef.description: The Zombie virus is active. Zombie hoards might be drawn to your colony. Any human bitten by a zombie will slowly die of the infection and will be reanimated as a zombie on death.

MapConditionDef.label: Zombie Virus Airborne
MapConditionDef.description: The Zombie virus is now airborne. All corpses will be reanimated regardless of the cause of death.
